website_summaries.verdict: Although not as versatile as other gel masks we considered as it can't be used warm, the design and quality make it worth considering if you only need a mask that cools.
pros: Is praised for its soft contours and comfortable fit
Soothes headaches, facial discomfort, and puffy eye areas
Secures easily thanks to the Velcro straps
cons: Offers cooling relief only, as you can't warm it in the microwave
Can occasionally be frozen, but cooling it in the refrigerator instead is recommended

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After discovering my peripheral vision was down to 20% in my left eye and 40% in my right, I had the eyelid surgery. I purchased 2 of these mask and they worked SO great! I was able to walk around and watch TV after my surgery while keeping the swelling down. They were so cold I cut holes in a thin washcloth to go between the mask and my eyes. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Look nowhere else!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect cold eye mask. Decent sized holes for eyes to see through, excellent fit, exactly what I was looking for. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great for sinus allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as he has sinus congestion due to his year-round allergies. He keeps it in the refrigerator because the freezer makes it too cold for his face. He puts it on and it helps his face relax more so he can breathe. I recommend this to anyone who has sinus allergies because it really helps my husband!
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: gimmicky
customer_reviews.text: It’s not exactly what I was looking for. I thought it could be frozen, but it can only be refrigerated. It works fine for the price that I paid. Doesn’t stay cool long Doesn’t make direct contact with the lower and upper eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask, very soothing
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for tired and or swollen eyes. The mask is so comfortable and soothing and relaxing. I like that it has an adjustable band that fits around your head sp it does not slip and slide around and you have to keep fiddling with it. Just adjust the band and it stays comfortably in place. Cools quickly in the fridge. Great product would not go without one now,
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A general waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those Amazon products you think you need and then are utterly disappointed once you actually receive it. - -- Takes a few hours to get cold but doesn't stay cold for more than 5-10 minutes after you place it on your face. -- It doesn't actually do anything (I purchased it for facial swelling and congestion). It made no difference. -- It doesn't lie flat on your face Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my eyes and used these gel packs on top of saline-soaked gauze pads post surgery. I bought two so one was chilling in the fridge while one was on my eyes. Such a relief to the whole area that I needed hardly any pain medicine. My predicted "black and blue" bruises were minimal. You can see through the holes just fine if you do not need gauze over stitches, as I did. I will use these in the future if I have a bad headache or sinus condition. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Leeds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't touch under eye area at all
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be ill fitted. I tried it on before freezing to see where it laid on my face and it gaps right under the eye. Making it useless for the purpose intended, relieve my itchy puffy eyes. Sad. I just want relief!
customer_reviews.author: Hmmm

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, kind of effective
customer_reviews.text: The best gel masks cover more surface area, reach closer to your undereye area with effective contours, and leave with that, "Ahhhhhhh," feeling when you take them off. This isn't that. It's serviceable, incredibly comfy, and a good value for the money. But if you want something that leaves better visual results, double your purchase price and get a premium version
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if you have a flat face with a flat nose it'll work, otherwise doesn't touch the under eye area at all when worn unless you push it with your fingers which is pretty futile. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerate not freeze
customer_reviews.text: I keep seeing negative reviews but they are all saying they put the mask in the freezer. The instructions in both this listing & on the box say refrigerator not freezer. I purchased for migraine relief & use as directed 6-8 min at a time Straight from the refrigerator. It does provide relief & unlike most masks I could tolerate it without it being too cold & I could actually look around. Actually have it on as I type this review.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Unbearably cold, but kind customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product only has the PVC plastic coating, which in turn create an unbearable freeze that gives a brain freeze on top of a migraine instead of relief. The strap is also not at all stretchy and just Velcro, so it gets caught in hair and pulls, and is not quick and easy to adjust. I’m modifying my review from 1 star to 2 stars due to the follow up of the seller. He emailed for feedback and refunded me for my dissatisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dryer

customer_reviews.title: It helps with headaches
customer_reviews.text: Needed one for the occasional headaches brought on from not getting enough sleep. First time around, put it in the freezer and forgot about it when it came to use it as hard as a rock! So, I would suggest no longer than 15 minutes in freezer for immediate use. Otherwise, it helped relieve my headache. Slips easily into the mask and rest comfortably around the eyes. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended - great item.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I bought this. Fits perfectly and is nice and cool if left in the fridge between uses. Does not emit a plastic odor either. Very soothing for the eyes and head; helps with swelling, congestion when sick, and headaches. Not recommended as a warm compress. Cooling effect only, but I have used it several times and it has not leaked. Comes nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: LALLAW

customer_reviews.title: The strap is sturdy and adjustable, it stays in place!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, well made product. The package that it comes in is sleek and looks nice. The mask itself comes in a little ziplock bag that I intend to keep the mask in since it goes on the refrigerator so it does not trap odors from the food. I tried it on and besides it looking silly, it feels amazing and it’s nice that it has eye holes so that you can be doing stuff around the house if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bretz

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Cooling eye pack. I was recently told I have Graves disease and the muscles holding my eyes are swollen and inflamed. This cool pack really helps and stays in place allowing me to wear it while around the house. The only thing I don’t like is that it loses the cold really fast, but since it’s refrigerated not frozen that’s understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Worked on my migraine! Love the eye cut outs
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I had a migraine that was running on day 3 and nothing else had helped, so I finally put this mask on as my last resort. Surprisingly, it cooled my face AND helped ease some of the migraine pain so I could fall asleep. I’ll remember that in the future!! So handy! This gel mask cools down in the refrigerator to the perfect temperature (no need for the freezer) and lasts the entire time it’s on my face! I absolutely love the eye cut outs and the storage bag, keeping it clean in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great value for the money. I just leave it in my fridge, only use it for cooling. I pop it on in the AM or when I get home from work and it refreshes me around my eyes and helps relieve tension. I have a larger nose so it doesn't fit perfectly, but it doesn't bother me. I haven't tried heating it yet and using for heat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mills

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Something That Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very busy person who rarely find time to rest. As a consequence, I developed horrible puffiness under my eyes. I've tried everything under the Sun including so-called natural remedies. The day this product was delivered, I gave it a quick rinse and put it in my fridge as recommended. I placed the product on my face and the first thing I noticed was how good it felt around my eyes. I hadn't noticed any difference but my family and co-workers did. Mind you, they had no idea of what I had done. I use this product daily..I am wearing it right know. I back this product 100%...honestly, Gregory-Lornell.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory-lornell: H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for Certain Purposes
customer_reviews.text: It stays in place. Eye holes are in the right place so you can walk around and watch TV while icing. Can’t use glasses with it though. Bought it for puffy bags under eyes following CPAP use. Not sure it will help for long period. Would have been perfect for icing eyes after eye surgery. Uncomfortably cold when first applying even though not frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I had some minor surgery around my eye/forehead area which resulted in some swelling and a black eye, so I was looking for something like this. It was perfect! It stays cool for a long time, is soft and comfortable and the eye holes are Great! I don't need to use it anymore, but I still do! I would recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cold for long and doesn’t make contact with lower eyelids
customer_reviews.text: The mask feels nice for about 5 minutes. However, it very quickly warms up to room temperature. Furthermore it barely, if at all, makes contact with my lower eyelids. This is the area of my eyes most in need of the cold compress and because of this, it’s been ineffective. Thus, this product is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Touch under the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: absolutely worthless for what it was sold as. Unless you just use it as a cold pack and press it there but you could of done that already with an ordinary gel pack. I suppose it will be useful on very hot nights to cool down which is why i gave it two stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: JoeFay

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected/awful smell
customer_reviews.text: This gel mask is not as expected.. it doesn’t sit underneath my eyes to reduce puffiness, instead it sits on the bridge of my nose and my eyebrows. It also has this awful smell which i don’t know if it comes from the plastic. I washed the gel mask about 4 times with soap and then face wash to remove the smell with no avail. It was super unpleasant and could not keep it on for longer than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: johana

customer_reviews.title: Works just dandy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure you can buy these for less in store but I didn’t want to go searching all over for one. Some reviews said it was super small. I found it to be the normal average size. Just put in your fridge and allow to cool. Feels amazing on the face whenyou have a migraine
customer_reviews.author: dirtfox13

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Two hours may be too long in the freezer unless you have a room temp mask under the mask. Helps when allergies kick in when pollen count is 60 mill. Pretty color and gel is nice. Fiancé still kisses me goodnight when I have it on. I think he appreciates it’s not a cat mask.
customer_reviews.author: lindsaymaybellamaria

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief!
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy! My allergies attacked my face, wicked bad. I remembered my mom had one of these and how well it worked. Couldn't find it in a store locally. Found this and if I tried prime I could receive the item the next day. My eyes hurt so bad, so I joined. Next day it arrived and the pure bliss it felt on my eyes was perfect. This item can't be beat for the relief it brings. It may make you look silly 🤣 but ever so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the Velcro aspect of this mas, sonitvis easily adjustable. It’s very helpful to relieve headache tension and under eye puffiness. However, it cannot be put in the freezer and does not retain coldness for more than about 3 minutes. Also, it works better if you put it on upside down - try it if you buy.
customer_reviews.author: mle411

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for puffy eyes
customer_reviews.text: It gets much colder than expected. It left red marks around my eyes. Easy remedied with a towel in between or letting it slightly warm up first. Would rather have a hook or something in the back as the velcro sticks to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Eye Comfort Never Felt So Good
customer_reviews.text: My old eyes tire easily after too much computer time. I keep my gel pad cooled and ready to use. I found it best to allow about a minute out of the refrigerator before applying to my face. In just a few minutes after application, my eyes are good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Dee W

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling eye mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I use it every night I started with it in the freezer but it was a little too cold so I just put it in the refrigerator and then I use it before I go to bed would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: dawn bosley

customer_reviews.title: For Severely Puffy Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eye mask for my daughter. She suffers with puffy eyes severely. She says that she didn’t like how stiff it becomes when cold therefore making a close fit around the eyes difficult and have to wait until it becomes a little soft and losing some of the coldness is a disadvantage. But overall she feels the product does its job.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pontiflet

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this for me. It’s very light weight and has an adjustable strap. The price is very good. My only wish is if it covered my upper eyelids and just below my eyes for some extra relief on those two specific puffy areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya H

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: When you take it out of the freezer and put it on, it's so cold that it's PAINFUL like brain freeze. If you wait 2 minutes, then you can probably stand to put it on. But then 2 minutes after that it's room temperature. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Maegiulia

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just wish I had a couple more
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cold, great for eye strain and sinus headaches, price is good, and it's great to be able to see when you need to unlike some other ice masks - but because it's refrigerated instead of stored in the freezer, it seems to warm up in 10 mins or so. Would be nice to keep a few of these in the fridge to rotate them in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Kimkoo Eye Mask. Needed a bit of modification.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different gel masks. One had a backing on it. The Kimkoo did not. Without the backing, it is too cold to place directly on the eyes. I placed a couple of layers of bathroom tissue between my skin and the mask and it worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Sorkin

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing but lash extensions beware
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it’s cooling and refreshing in the mornings. Con: i have eyelash extensions & the eye holes are kinda small so they squish my lashes. I wish the eye holes were a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my eyes/under eye
customer_reviews.text: I am asian, I believe I have an average face but it did not fit my face. The under eye bags which were the problem and target area I wanted to hit with these would not be covered correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Stop the puffy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite products to use when waking up to stop the dark circles under my eyes or the puffy eyes. Packing says Don't store this product in the freezer. You would think for puffy eyes or swelling you would want it frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cools for quite some time
customer_reviews.text: Really good product if following direction of not freezing it. I use it about twice a week and works really well. The only thing I would say is I would have to adjust quite a bit to make sure it's touching my lower eyes. Over all good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing e now. I've enjoyed this product. It has helped me with facial puffiness and also in preventing headaches. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Duran

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for sinusitis relief! Better then bead ones!
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed! This thing is awsome! I was miserable with sinusitis till finding this. Has gel that stays hot or cold for an hr at a time. It shapes to your face even completly frozen it still moves. Way better then the bead ones that only stay cold 15min. I highly recommend! Exspecially if you suffer from sinusitis or migraines. Eye cutouts are perfect too so you can wear it while you do what ya need to.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lake

customer_reviews.title: So soothing
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Great price. A very soothing after work relaxation treat. Especially nice on hot Summer days. Gets ice cold even in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Scherer

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it doesn't stay cold for long
customer_reviews.text: This provides a couple minutes of cold when I put it on my face in the morning. It's nice but I wish it stayed cold for longer. Might try putting it in the freezer which is against the instructions you receive with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Used it Almost Every Night
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the fridge and use it to cool down in the middle of the night, as my face tends to get hot during sleep. I warms a bit too fast and there is no information about being able to freeze it, which is the only reason I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Alexander Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an eye mask that had holes in the eyes because sometimes I get bored to be 15 minutes with my eyes closed. This is perfect because I can relax if I want to or I can watch some tv while I wear it. It fits perfect and I use it everyday and every night for a cooling effect. I'm very happy with it and I'm also getting one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie van Ginhoven

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Mask
customer_reviews.text: It was leaking the inside gel when it arrived. The package looked intact, so I’m not sure what the issue was. Customer support did reach out to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K.

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible for price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only complaint is that I don't sit all around my eyes but that could also be my shape of head or the way it froze. I have to push it down and I got this one hoping I could just wear it around why I did other things.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice treat for your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I used this to reduce the swelling under my eyes. The only issue that I gave with this product is that the mask doesn't fit flush on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Jfuller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, packaged beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Love these... I bought 2; one to use and the other to freeze after sinus surgery. They worked great and kept the swelling down...no black eyes!.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Funny looking but functional.
customer_reviews.text: Not pretty but does what I wanted it to do. I like that I can watch TV while using it. And it makes my family laugh when they see me in it.
customer_reviews.author: farmergirl

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hopefully help with the bags under my eyes. However, I have to press down on the mask right under my eyes so it will touch my face. I am keeping it because it feels so good and it will eventually help reduce the bags (I hope)!
customer_reviews.author: BARHG

customer_reviews.title: Not designed well
customer_reviews.text: Feel nice and relaxing but doesn't even touch under your eyes where you need it most for puffiness. If you're buying it to reduce puffiness, don't. It doesn't lay right. But is nice for relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Nina johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product, but after 2 uses the plastic ripped and the gel from the inside started coming out. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: B4dawn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for under eyes
customer_reviews.text: This mask didn’t lay flat under my eyes so the under eye wasn’t getting any benefit. I could only feel the cooling light pressure on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Granados

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and arrived quickly. For the money I am happy with the purchase. I have been keeping in the fridge and it has worked great to relieved sinus pressure for allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing to have to start your day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this.. I have only had it a few days so I’m yet to really see improvements In my eyes but I love the way it feels. It’s extremely refreshing to put on first thing in the morning or late at night after a stressful tiring day. I love the little bag it comes with too, keeps it clean and safe while in the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Freezes quickly and the shape is perfect. Wife is recovering from cosmetic Eye surgery. Chilled Tuck Pads soaked in witch hazel then place ice pack on top 15 min 4x day and Pre-bed
customer_reviews.author: dallas C Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is not as expected, very thin and cheaply made. It stays cool for pretty short period of time. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is good quality. It is very comfortable but too big for my head. I feel like it focuses on my forehead when I wanted to focus on my eyes. No issues with the product I just bought the wrong style. My only complaint is how quick it gets warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great gel eye mask!! It is perfect to wear after a long day while taking a bath and decompressing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Paul

customer_reviews.title: Eye holes don’t fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The eye holes are too small. Presses on my eyes and makes it uncomfortable. There must be better ones than this.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Saris

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery and exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this eyemask shortly after having a plastic surgery procedure. It was exactly what I needed and helped reduce the swelling and puffiness and overall pain I was experiencing. It arrived quickly and I recieved a personalized note that was very nice and contact information should I have an problems. I did not have any trouble and would recommend this product!! Thank you Alice W
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: terrible product for seasonal allergy issues with puffy bottoms of eyes. Freezes you upper parts of eyes. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Real Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to use, but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use, but runs small compared to complimentary ones they give you elsewhere - e.g., doctors’ offices.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Soothing cool gel mask.
customer_reviews.text: This gel mask has helped my allergies. I put it in every night before bed and no longer wake up with swollen eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Native To This Land

customer_reviews.title: Great for swollen eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from sinus issues and it makes my eyes swell. This is why I ordered this and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after seeing that Patrick Bateman uses it. Feels great in the morning and wakes you up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great but Will Not Stay Cool For Long
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mask other than the fact that it won’t stay cool for more than 2-3 minutes :(
customer_reviews.author: MarissaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ver happy with this item
customer_reviews.text: The mask is very nice, as soon as i opened it i still felt the coolness though it was from the road not from the fridge, i will use it for long i am sure
customer_reviews.author: Natia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality feels so good around my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The ‘mask’ fits great on my face. I do get puffy eyes sometimes and I was happy to see that it did a great job of minimizing the puffiness. I’d imagine that if you got headaches behind your eyes this mask would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to work very well.
customer_reviews.text: I used the mask as directed three times on my swollen eyes, and could not see much difference. However, I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and useful
customer_reviews.text: The gel can hold the cold much longer, very comfortable and useful, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: This product quickly broke. I used for about a week and then the gel began to leak from the mask.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Cool and relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my mom and she really likes this! Since it goes in the fridge, not the freezer, it’s safe for the delicate skin around your eyes, and the gel molds nicely to your face. It also stays cool for a good amount of time, too. I will probably get another for myself because I work nights and my eyes get puffy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Isadora

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lay on the eye bags properly
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says but the design of it is such that the gel doesn’t touch the most important part - the portion of the under eye bags near the nose bridge. The nose bridge holds the eye gel up and it does not touch the skin in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a great relief for migraines.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to leave in the fridge and pull out when I have a migraine. Very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: kristine k

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and lightweight. Coverage over face is great! I just wish that they would stay colder longer! Bought these for my boyfriend who broke his nose at work. They are refrigerate only, no freezer. They take at least 35 to 40 minutes to get cold again in fridge and keep their cold for no longer than 25 minutes on face.
customer_reviews.author: Cameo Jete

customer_reviews.title: If its good enough for Bateman
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I have a fridge in my room ao this is great to throw on in the morning if my eyes are too puffy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry puffy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good when your eyes do not. When winter hits the furnace is on and it makes my eyes very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene W

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my migraines!
customer_reviews.text: This helps so much for when I get migraines! So happy to come across this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye cooling mask I have ever used. I wish I could wear it all day It decreases puffiness. It's fantastic.! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lady D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my eyes post surgery. Gets nice and cold in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Best cold mask you can get
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product. I will never buy one of those lame gel bead filled masks again. This mask stays cold for almost 45 minutes on your face and really helps with bags under the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Aphelion

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but could be better
customer_reviews.text: comfortable on my face but doesn’t do much to reduce the swelling/puffiness around my eyes. kinda disappointed. gel isn’t very thick, so it doesn’t hold the coolness for very long
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rothgarn

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’d like a Amazon credit. I didn’t write bad review. Does not stay on face whatsoever. Pretty disappointed. Just hate to give negative reviews
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for puffy eyes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mask every day for weeks, and it really helps soothe the heat and puffiness around my eyes and face. It’s lightweight and stays at a consistent cool temperature in the fridge. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: london.96

customer_reviews.title: Causes scabs and blisters
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Caused severe redness and rash near corners of my eyes. Turned into a blister and bled bc of this. Only used one time for 20mim and had this reaction. Unfortunately, this product is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on your face. Helps with any puffy eyes or dark circles in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Mask
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable eye mask and this one is it. It cools quickly and helps with the puffiness of my eyes instantly.
customer_reviews.author: mindi rue

customer_reviews.title: SOOTHING
customer_reviews.text: My eye swelled up and ached from a bug bite. This mask felt so soothing. I put it on now just for relief and comfort especially after working outside in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kimkoo mask is the best
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, received on time, no problems, put in fridge to cool down. GF loves the mask, very cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: You can do other activities while cooling you eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend and she seemed pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great for mornings, especially after a rough night. Listen to your inner Patrick Bateman and add this mask to your daily regimen. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't exactly sit under my eyes which is where I need it the most. However, you can make it work and it only stays cold for about 10 min. For the price and a quick fix for puffy eyes, it's sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Stays cool for literally 5 minutes. As instructed, put it in my fridge (not freezer)... which is set at 38 degrees... for the lack of better words, this product sucks
customer_reviews.author: Whoyou

customer_reviews.title: Good looking gel mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. Seems like its a decent product, well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Earthwmn

customer_reviews.title: Cold
customer_reviews.text: It gets really cold I can’t put it on right out the refrigerator I have to let it set a minute first.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product, but it actually gets too Cold, then looses its coldness
customer_reviews.text: I still highly recommend it for the price. Its feels like ice once coming out of the freezer so you may have to let is rest before attaching it to your face. I do think the gel beads may be better but I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I keep mine in the freezer; it does freeze up like ice. Your choice to keep it in the freezer or fridge for coolness. My personal choice is keep it in the freezer and then allow it to melt a little before apply it to my face. I see the coolness lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Lopez

product_meta.title: Kimkoo Gel Eye Mask Cold Pads&Cool Compress for Puffy Eyes and Dry Eye,Cooling Eye Ice Masks Gel
product_meta.description:
The cold stimulation leads to local capillary contraction, and the localized cooling inhibits the body's own metabolic levels and alleviates inflammatory responses.

The ice eye mask is simple, natural, convenient and effective. Simply put the eye mask in the refrigerator for 2 hours, or more, and then use it for 6-8 minutes.

Helps improve the overall health of the eyes, and is reusable and environmentally friendly.

 Reduces eye puffiness

 Helps prevent premature skin aging

 Reduces inflammation
feature_bullets: It is very helpful to Relieves Eye Fatigue and Releases Eye Pressure , and prevent black eye and dry eyes puffiness.
Put it in the refrigerator 2 hours or more , Then apply it on your eyes for about 6 minutes each time.

The product is tested by CPSC-certified laboratory ,Gel eye patch is produced with environmental friendly condensate water and purified water. It is sealed with cold-resistant soft TPU, containing no toxin and no latex.
Longer cold compress time and more contact with skin surface than gel beads.
It does not cover eyes, enables reading, watching TV while soothing the eye area. The length of the band can be adjusted as needed It can be used repeatedly.
